Toggle Menu

salt.modules.rest_service

Service support for the REST example

list_

Syntax

salt.modules.rest_service.list_( )

Details

List services.

CLI Example:

salt '*' rest_service.list <service name>

restart

Syntax

salt.modules.rest_service.restart(
								name
								)

Details

Restart the named service

CLI Example:

salt '*' rest_service.restart <service name>

start

Syntax

salt.modules.rest_service.start(
								name
								)

Details

Start the specified service

CLI Example:

salt '*' rest_service.start <service name>

status

Syntax

salt.modules.rest_service.status(
								name
								)

Details

Return the status for a service, returns a bool whether the service is running.

CLI Example:

salt '*' rest_service.status <service name>

stop

Syntax

salt.modules.rest_service.stop(
								name
								)

Details

Stop the specified service

CLI Example:

salt '*' rest_service.stop <service name>
